about_the_game:
Tired of easy online football management games? 90 Minute Fever is free-to-play and offers extremely challenging gameplay where you get to compete against others from all over the world!

Retro Artstyle / Classic Playability

90 Minute Fever pays tribute to football management games from the past offering streamlined gameplay focussed on the things that actually matter!

Manage Live Matches

Our matches are not pre-simulated! You are able to make substitutions, tactical changes and watch the action unfold on the pitch as the matches are fully simulated in real time.

Comprehensive Youth and Training Setup

Handpick which players get promoted from your Youth Academy into your club. Have a hands-on role in their training and watch them flourish into players for your Senior Squad.

Play on Your Own Schedule

Innovative league system that doesn’t require you to have to login at specific times. Play your league matches live at times that are convenient for you!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Big Sur 11 or newer
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Big Sur 11 or newer
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (build 19043) or newer
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 or Vulkan capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (build 19043) or newer
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 or Vulkan capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers
